Around Pluto, the small ship's computer warned its occupant.

Computer: Opt=
imus Prime has arrived on the third planet.

The massive bot looked at the =
system's display. Prime had taken
another way to get there, it seemed.

???=
: New waypoint entry. Waypoint Theta: High orbit of Mars. Proceed now.

The=
 ship sped up and was soon on its way. He didn't want to be too
close, at l=
east for now. He reached over his head for something...

 over his ocular systems. Now everyone

nd his "windshield"

All in all he looked like some sort of robot sent back from =

ould live with that.

oxes on these pods
